investing in early stage tech explorations

Discovering
the Unknown

We believe that the most groundbreaking technological innovations emerge at the fringes. That's why we support global founders who dare to experiment with technology, even when there's no clear use case for their creations.

不知 means ‘unknown’ in Chinese. Buzhi represents our commitment to backing the unexplored.

our approach

Early-Stage Investment

We invest in seed or pre-seed rounds in exchange for equity or crypto-tokens.

Problem Solving

We collaborate with founders on challenging problems and conduct adversarial audits of their technology.

Hands-On Collaboration

We work closely with your team, tinkering with your tech and helping you build a strong community.

our experience comes from

OpenZeppelin Decentraland The Graph Fundit Aleph Optimism Li.finance Mimic Exactly Mailchain Connext Pods ODOS Cedalio Flashbots Snapshot Tally POAP

get in touch

If you're working on something cool, we want to hear from you. Contact us.
